name: Ray
description: Ray is an AI compute engine with core distributed runtime and AI libraries for accelerating ML workloads
tags: Ray Core abstractions: Tasks, Actors, Objects for distributed computing
Multiple controller execution modes for development and production
Runs on any machine, cluster, cloud provider, and Kubernetes
Monitoring and debugging tools (Ray Dashboard, Distributed Debugger)
AI Libraries: Ray Data, Train, Tune, RLlib, Serve for ML workloads
Core distributed runtime for scaling AI and Python applications
Seamless scaling from laptop to cluster
Native programming pattern for federated computing
